tool_description: Compares catering vendor quotes and ingredient supplier pricing to identify optimal cost-effective options while maintaining quality standards.

ingredient_requirements.description: List of required ingredients with quantities

error_messages: Insufficient vendor quotes: Provide at least 2 vendor quotes for meaningful comparison.
Invalid ingredient format: List ingredients with specific quantities (e.g., '10 lbs chicken breast').
Invalid delivery date: Provide a future date in ISO 8601 format.
Budget constraint error: Budget must be a positive number if specified.
Invalid quality requirements: Use recognized standards like organic, local, premium, or standard.
Geographic preference error: Choose from local, regional, or national.
usage: Provide ingredient_requirements, vendor_quotes arrays, and delivery_date. Optionally set quality_requirements, budget_constraint, and geographic_preference. Returns detailed cost comparison and recommendations.

recommended_vendor.description: Top recommended vendor based on analysis criteria

total_cost_estimate.description: Total estimated cost for all ingredients from recommended vendor

cost_breakdown.description: Detailed cost breakdown by ingredient category

alternative_vendors.description: Alternative vendor options with cost differences

quality_assessment.description: Quality evaluation of recommended vendor options
